description: TO ELECT A SPEAKER TO PRESIDE OVER THE SEVENTY-FIFTH CONGRESS, BANKHEAD, (D) VERSUS SNELL, (R).  VOTES FOR BANKHEAD ARE PUNCHED 1, SNELL 2, CRAWFORD 5, AND SCHNEIDER ARE PUNCHED 6.
Issue1: Election of the Speaker of the House
